question: You live near a public school. The school has asked residents to help with the maintenance of school buildings and play areas. Write a letter to the principal.In your letterexplain why you would like to helptell them how you can helplet them know when you are available.
text: I am a father of your student studying 8th grade in your school. I am writing to inform you about a support request for the conservation of school premises.

My son doing his studies in your education institution since his childhood as well as I was an old student of this prestigious school. Since there is a long relationship between me and the school. I would like to take part in the maintenance activity of school premises and the children's playground. I am good at painting and providing creative ideas. I can help you out with wonderful themes that can be painted on the wall as well as I will ask my neighbour to take part with us in improving playground amenities such as fixing the basketball court and the football goal post.

Next week, I have a busy schedule at my workplace which makes it difficult for me to participate, but I am available from 21/08/2022 to the 1st week of November. I will apply for leave with my manager and will work on it.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
